author: matkt0
content: hello, what is the scope of bal-devnet 2 , like that we can focus on the right change

author: nero_eth
content:
One prio has been implementing the batch IO feature. While this isn't spec-related - it would be great to have as it allows us to measure how much we eventually get from batch IO + parallel exec vs only parallel exec.
The latest spec changes included moving the BAL out from the EL block and the retention period for storing it. Additionally we should already have the [json rpc methods](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/726) ready for devnet 2.

author: nero_eth
content: Re the json rpc methods mentioned above, would be great to get them reviewed and merged. I saw <@425572898787426305> and <@372731338031366165> have already checked them out. Thanks!
